name: Megestrol Acetate
indications: megestrol acetate oral suspension , usp indicated treatment anorexia , cachexia , unexplained , significant weight loss patients diagnosis acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ( aids ) .
contraindications: recommended adult initial megestrol acetate oral suspension , usp 800mg/day ( 20 ml/day ) . shake container well using . trials evaluating different dose schedules , daily doses 400 800 mg/day found clinically effective .
warningsAndPrecautions: megestrol acetate oral suspension , usp 40 mg/ml available creamy-white , lemon-lime flavored oral suspension , oral , containing 40 mg micronized megestrol acetate per ml . ndc 0116-4011-08 bottles 8 fl oz ( 240ml ) ndc 0116-4011-16 bottles 1 pint ( 480 ml ) ndc 0116-4011-10 10 ml unit dose cups trays 10
adverseReactions: history hypersensitivity megestrol acetate component formulation . known suspected pregnancy .
indications_original: Megestrol Acetate Oral Suspension, USP is indicated for the treatment of anorexia, cachexia, or an unexplained, significant weight loss in patients with a diagnosis of acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS).
contraindications_original: The recommended adult initial dosage of Megestrol Acetate Oral Suspension, USP is 800mg/day (20 mL/day). Shake container well before using. In clinical trials evaluating different dose schedules, daily doses of 400 and 800 mg/day were found to be clinically effective.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Megestrol Acetate Oral Suspension, USP 40 mg/mL is available as a creamy-white, lemon-lime flavored oral suspension, for oral administration, containing 40 mg of micronized megestrol acetate per mL.
                  NDC 0116-4011-08 Bottles of 8 fl oz (240mL)
                  NDC 0116-4011-16 Bottles of 1 Pint (480 mL)
                  NDC 0116-4011-10 10 mL unit dose cups in trays of 10
adverseReactions_original: History of hypersensitivity to megestrol acetate or any component of the formulation. Known or suspected pregnancy.
